msIdentifier.collection: Gondal Collection formerly of Jivarama Kalidasa Sastri

msDesc.p: This MS is described in śrī bhuvaneśvarī pīṭh, goṃḍala – saurāṣṭra: hasta- likhita granthasūcī; Shri Bhuvaneshwari Pith, Gondal, Saurashtra, (India). Cata- logue & Index of Manuscripts(Goṇḍal: Śrī Bhuvaneśvarī Pīṭh, 1960), serial number 34, p. 26. The catalogue records the date of copying the MS as saṃ 1996 (CE 1939/40), and the number of leaves as 37. The late date of copying suggests that Jīvarāma Kālidāsa Śāstri, who assembled the Gondal MS col- lection, may have had the manuscript copied for his library from another extant copy. The whole of the Śrī Bhuvaneśvarī Pīṭh Goṇḍal MS collection was trans- ferred to The Gujarat Ayurvedic University, Jamnagar, in about 1970, and is now housed there in the university library block. The manuscript was inspected briefly during a visit to Jamnagar in 1991, and a photocopy was received in early 1993. The manuscript does not include drawings or ṭippaṇa.

div.p: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ // atha rasendramaṅgalo nāma graṃtho likhyate //

lg.l:
natvā surendraṃ śiva
saukhyadāyakaṃ apāra saṃsāra samudratārakaṃ //

sarvvārthasiddhipradamukhya maṃgalaṃ graṃthaṃ prava
kṣyāmi rasendramaṃgalaṃ // 1 //
cinnaaṃ ca gaṃdhayuktyādiḥ paṃjanaṃ ṣaṣṭhame smṛtaṃ //

saptamaṃ viṣa
... nnaṃ ca aṣṭamaṃ gaṇasaṃjñakaṃ //

bahuḥ sveya
na gāmitāṃ na yeddravate vyādhisamūhamūrchitaḥ //

jāritojanmavināśinaḥ svayaṃ kramito raṃji
to bhukti muktidaḥ //

bhasmākāra gataṃ girīrājaṃ aśitaṃ bhūcāra
pārāvāra mapārapāradaṃ tasmātkaḥ karuṇā karo+paraḥ //

śatāśvamedhena kṛtena puṇya
gau koṭidānena gajendrakoṭibhiḥ //
suvarṇa bhūdānasamānadharmma nṛṇāṃ bhavet sūtakaṃ darśanena //

tadṛṣṭa nityaṃ labhate manuṣyosya
śādra sasparśanena sevanena //
kāruṇya puṃjaṃ harimīśarūpaṃ sākṣādrasendraṃ prathitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ //
yovaina jānāti rasendrakarmmāṇyasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi kathaṃ sa vaidyaḥ //

na vaitti yo vaira sa rājasevanaṃ kāruṇakīrtiḥ sakathaṃ
śilebhe //

nāyāti tulyaṃ na
yanātha bhūtale rasendrayogācutakoṭiraṃśataḥ //

malaṃ viṣaṃ vanhigurutva cāpalaṃ naisarggikaṃ
doṣamuśaṃti tajjñāḥ //

malenamū
rdhaśikhinātha dāhaṃ viṣeṇa mṛtyuṃ pravahaṃti saṃtaḥ //

gurutvadoṣeṇa karoti śūlaṃ na tiṣṭhate //
taccapala ca doṣāt //

a
baddha sūtaṃ lihitaṃ pramādāt karoti kuṣṭaṃ prabalaṃ rasendraḥ //

tasmādādau ca proktāni karmmā
ṇi ṣaṣṭādaśāni ca //

saṃsvedanaṃ mardanamūrchanaṃ ca
uthāpanaṃ pātanadīpane ca //
niyāmakaṃ rodhana cāraṇaṃ ca dvaṃdvaṃ drutīnāṃ drvagarbhajāraṇaṃ //
grāsapramāṇaṃ vidhi raṃjanaṃ ca saṃsāraṇaṃ krāmaṇayedhayogaṃ //

na vetti yo vaivapuṣiprayuṃjanaṃ
rasendrarājaḥ sa karoti nāśaṃ //

ebhididaṃ mathitaṃ na ca
vāraṃ svedamidaṃ tridinaṃ rasarāje //

tena yuktarasaṃ
svinnaṃ tridinaṃ muhu vanhinā //
dolāyaṃ ṇatī vareṇa marddayitvā punaḥ punaḥ //

siddhārtha rājītridinānāni khalve
saṃ marddanaṃ sūtamuśaṃti saṃtaḥ //

kaṃcukī ca gasatī
bahākānaṃditīśvara latā ca śūlinī //

sarpavallī rasarājamardditaṃ mūrcciti bhramati yāti
saṃcatāṃ //

kimatra citraṃ yadi rājavarttakaṃ śirīṣapuṣpārdarasena bhā
vāvitaṃ //
kimatra citraṃ rasakaṃ rasena rajasvalāyāḥ kusumena bhāvitaṃ //

krameṇa kṛtvā urageṇa raṃjita
karoti śulvaṃ tripuṭena kāṃcanaṃ //

vātāri
tāpena ghṛtena tāpyaṃ puṭena dagdhaṃ varaśuddhimeti //
dvividhā vimalā pācyā raṃbhāto yena saṃyutā //
kaṃmūlikā ghanakhaḥ karavīrakīra jaṃbīranīra kapivesa māranālaḥ //

raktotpalaḥ śaśavasā
śaśi śāṃrgatailaḥ saṃpācitaṃ hi gaganaṃ rasa saṃnnibhaṃ syāt //

śyāma śyāmī madanakodravamāṣara
rṇī śṛṃgī ghaṭodbhava ghanadava nivetasaśva //

kvāthaṃ kulaththa jaghanīra jaṃvīrasūra saṃpācito-
pi tridinaṃ pariśuddhimeti //

vaikrāṃta saptaparipācitamamlamū
traiḥ kṣāraistathā paṭuvasā vṛṣameghamiśraiḥ //
agnau saṃtāpya nirguṇī rase siktaṃ ca saptadhā //

bhūtibhasmalavaṇe
na saṃyutāḥ śodhayaṃti puṭapāka kāṃcanaṃ //

nāgena kṣārarājena drāvitaṃ śuddhi mṛ
dyuti //

aho na citraṃ pṛthivībhaṭena
kṣāreṇa meṣī payasā ghṛtena //
tālena vidvanhutaṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ bhavecca śulvaṃ śaśai śaṃkha sannibhaṃ //
ṣaḍguṇena ca nāgena śodhayitvā tato budhaḥ //

śulvasya kāli
kā hyeva praṇaśyaṃti na saṃśayaḥ //

snigdhaṃ tāpena bhavati
kālikārahitaṃ ca tat //

kṣāraṃ guḍaṃ haṃsapadaṃ calākṣārasetaghṛṣṭvāradalanipaścā
tsaṃlepya kaṃkuṣṭaniśānvitānidhyāniśuddhyaṃti ca saptavārān //

kṣāraṃ
caṭaṃ kaṇayutaṃ lavaṇāni paṃca jaṃīranīraparibhāṣita saptavārān //

kalkena tena parilipta
puṭena dagdhaṃ tārāśulva ghanaghoṣamupaiti śuddhiṃ //

gopālikā gorasa nāgaḍucī haraṃti sarvve giridoṣa
māyasāt //

gaurīphalāni rajanī kṣurakaḥ kuberabījāni tuṃburu yutāni ca
mallikāyāḥ //
vārāṇi saptaparirvāpananāgarājaṃ kalkena na tena khalu śuddhimupaiti sadyaḥ //

yuktyā krameṇa yadi
śubhrajalena ḍullī staṃbhaṃ karoti kuṭilasya vadaṃti saṃtaḥ //

takre piṣṭaṃ mala ha
ramidaṃ sarvalohaprasiddhaṃ //
baṃgaṃ staṃbhaṃ kṣaṇāmapi kurute jyotiṣo nāmayogaḥ //

meṣaśṛṃgaṃ bhujaṃgāsthi kūrmmapṛṣṭaṃ śilā
jatu snuhīhī tāla rajaḥ stanyaṃ kāṃta pāṣāṇa bhasma ca //

vajrakaṃ vāpi vaikrāṃtaṃ tanmadhya prekṣipadbudhaḥ
tīvrānalaḥ puṭaṃ dattvā puṭāṃ taṃ yāvadāgataṃ //

taptaṃ niṣe
cayetkalke yāvattau bhasmatāṃ gatau //
gorasanā kṛta guṭikā vajraṃ puṭapākato hanti //

kāṃ
tāśmameṣaśṛṃgaṃ ca gaṃdhakaṃ ca śilājatu //

vajrakaṃ vāpi vai
krāṃntaṃ tanmadhye nikṣipedbudhaḥ //

kulattha kodravāṇāṃ tu haya
mūtreṇa peṣayet //

tīvrā
nalaiḥ puṭaṃ datvā puṭāṃ taṃ yāvadāgatau //

kulatthakodravāṇāṃ tu hayamūtreṇa peṣayet taptaṃ niṣecayet kalke
yāvattad bhasmatāṃ gataṃ //

kīlāla pākhuvid gaṃdhā me
ṣa śṛṃgīghaṭodbhavaḥ //
jalabhāṃḍe ca tat svinnaṃ saptāhe drava tāṃ vrajet //
cūrṇīkṛtaṃ gaganapatramathāranāle dhṛtvā dinaikamavaśoṣya ca sūraṇasthaṃ //

piṣikṛtaṃ ca bahuśo mahiṣī malenae
saṃśoṣya koṣṭhagatamāśu dhamed dṛḍhāgnau //

satvaṃ paceca gaganasya caturvidhasya tāpīruhasya bahuśo
śmajadhātutaśca //
phalatrayaṃ vanhibalābalā ca bhūvalli gopendraka mātṛvāhakaḥ //

ṣaḍviṃdukā maṃḍa
likāṃrajāha koṣāśvagaṃdhā dvimukhīpunarna vā //

dīnārikā sūraṇa kaṃcukī ca kīṭāriṇī gokṣura
kāśvapāhā //
unmattakolāṃgalikā ca vīrā kṣāratrayaṃ syāllavaṇāni paṃca //

etaiḥ kaṣāyaiḥ sa
kulattha vetasaṃ sauvīrakaṃ svedyamaśeṣadhātavaḥ //

tatraiva patate satvaṃ vaikrāṃ
tasya na saṃśayaḥ //

kṣaudraṃgaṃdharvatailaṃ saghṛtamabhinavaṃ gaurasaṃmūtra baca
bhūyo vātāritailaṃ kadalirasayutaṃ bhāvanā kīrtītāstāḥ //

mūṣāṃ kṛtvāgnivarṇā maruṇa karanibhāṃ
prakṣipenmākṣikeṃdraṃ satvaṃ nāgendratulyaṃ patati mṛdutayā sūryavaiśvānarābhaṃ //

mahā vṛkṣyarka
kṣīrābhyaṃ strīstanyena tu bhāvitaṃ //

kāṃjike ba
huśaḥ svinnaṃ tāpya cūrṇa kaṭu trikaṃ //

ghṛhadhūpaṃ ghṛtakṣau
draṃ saṃyuktaṃ punareva ca //
tāpyaṃ muṃcati satvaṃ rasakaṃ ca tri saṃghātaiḥ //

atha rasakasatvaṃ
kṣīraiḥ snehaistathā cāmlaiḥ rasakaṃ bhāvitaṃ muhuḥ //

atha tālakasatvaṃ
tilasarṣapaśigūṇāṃ lākṣā ca lavaṇaṃ guḍaṃ //
tālakasya prayogena satvaṃ hema prabhaṃ bhavet //

vajrakaṃda samā
yuktaṃ bhāvitaṃ kadalī rasaiḥ //

satvaṃ caṃdrārkka saṃ
kāśaṃ patate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
nīrasamaṃ bhavati ghanaṃ gogoṣṭhe dharaṇīgataṃ māsaṃ //

paśu salila vahu subhāvi
takapitiṃdukacūrṇa vāpitaṃ gaganaṃ //
bhavati haravīrya sadṛśaṃ milati rase śubha vidhānena //

kuliśataru dugdha bhāvita saptāhāt
dhāmitaṃ dravati //

ciraṃ tiṣṭhati rasarūpaṃ kusuṃ
bhikātaila saṃyuktaṃ //
kaṃcukī kaṃdakaṃ cūrṇa nijarasa bhāvitaṃ samastāni //

lohāni toya sadṛ
śāni karoti gaganaṃ viśeṣeṇa //

pakṣaṃ hi
śarāva puṭe bahu vāraṃ bhavati rasarūpaṃ //

kṛ
ta parivāpaṃ kanakaṃ tiṣṭhati suciraṃ yathā toyaṃ //
dravati canotthānaṃ punaḥ kanakaṃ bahuśo+pi kālena //

sasāhaṃ paridhamitaṃ tattīkṣṇaṃ bhavati rasarūpaṃ
atha sarvvadhātudrutiḥ //

lohāḥ
ni bbhavaṃti khalu svacchāni ca lekhanayogyāni //
eka eva mahā drāvī pārvatīnātha saṃbhavaḥ //

puṭapāke
na taccūrṇaṃ dravate salilaṃ yathā //

tālena baṃgaṃ daradena
tīkṣṇaṃ nāgena hemaṃ śilayā ca nāgaṃ //

gaṃdhāśmanā caiva nihaṃti śulvaṃ tāraṃ ca mākṣīkarasena ha
nyāt //
baṃgaṃ palāśena ca tālakena nāgaṃ raverdugdha manaḥ śilābhiḥ //

hemaṃ tathā vajrīrasena nā
ga tāraṃ snuhī kṣīra sumākṣikena //

śulvamajākṣīra sugaṃdhakena tīkṣṇaṃ sunārīpayo hiṃgulena
ṣaḍāyasānāṃ kuliśakṛtānāṃ nirutthaghātaṃ kathitaṃ hi tajjñaiḥ //

mṛtāni lohāni rasī bhavaṃti
rasena yuktyāmayanāśanāni //

jambīranīranavasāraghanāmlavargaiḥ kṣārāṇi paṃcalavaṇāni kaṭutrayaṃ ca
śiśūdakaṃ surabhi sūraṇa vajrakaṃdaiḥ saṃmarddito rasanṛpo carate+ṣṭalohāt //

gaṃdhaṃ tālakamākṣikāya sarajaḥ sūtendra miśrīkṛtaṃ pathyā tryūṣaṇamagnimaṃtha surasā śṛṃgī viṣaṃ
ṭaṃkaṇaṃ //

datvā khalvatale sumarddita draḍhaṃ nirguṇḍimuṇḍīrase guṃjāyugmamitāśca baddhaguṭikā ni
ghnanti vātaṃ draḍhaṃ //

tīkṣṇaṃ śulvasurāyasaṃ ca gaganaṃ tāpīruhaṃ tālakaṃ
gaṃdhābhraṃ rasarājamiśritasamaṃ dhṛtvā ca khalve bhiṣaka //

drākṣā gaura padāpayojavivisinī kaṃdānvi
tā cāmṛtā ghṛṣṭvā yaṣṭirasai sitā madhuyutā gadyāṇamātrāvaṭī //

pittaṃ hanti ca pittasaṃbhavagadā
n sarvośva pittajvarān kāsaśvāsamalāmayakṣayatṛṣādāhāṃśca śoṣaṃ bhṛśaṃ //

bhakṣyā netramitā
niśīthasamaye svapne prasādīkṛto nāmnā tīkṣṇamukho rasendrapravaraḥ śrīnāgabodhoditaḥ //

śulvaṃ tālakatāṃḍavaṃ dhvanighane sūtendra golaṃ kṛtaṃ kāśmīraṃ suradā
lirāyakaṭukākauśātakī saiṃdhavaṃ //

nirguṃḍīdravabaddhaghṛṣṭa guṭikā kvāthe tvariṣṭe tathā
śleṣmāṇaṃ vinihaṃti śīrṣa jagadān saṃkoca śulvo rasaḥ //

atha maṃthānabhairavo rasaḥ
sutaṃ śulvaśilālakāmbaraghanaṃ saṃkuṭyamiśrīkṛtaṃ kuṣṭaṃ nāgabalā vidāri ca balā go
karkairaṇḍakaṃ //
hatvā khalva tale vimarddita draḍhaṃ barṣābhuvaḥ sve rase

gadyāṇaikamitā nibaddha
guṭikā vātaṃ ca pittaṃ jayet //

eṣāṃ parpaṭakadraveṇa
racitā gadyāṇa mātrā vaṭī līḍhā sā madhunā nihaṃti sahasā śleṣmānvitaṃ mārutaṃ //

kāṃtasūtakaśulvagaṃdhaka rajaḥ kṣārānalaṃ padmakaṃ trāyaṃtī kuṭajasya bījamamṛtā bhūniba
yuktā vaṭī //

kṛtvā parpaṭaladraveṇa matimā līdvānihaṃti bhṛśaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vajranipātanādiva haretpi
ttaṃ kaphenānvitam //

tālaṃ tāpya jagaṃdhakaṃ ca vimalaṃ kāṃtāratī
kṣṇābhrakaṃ maṃḍuraṃ kuliśaṃ surāya saghanaṃ ebhiḥ samaṃ sūtakaṃ //

ebhiḥ sarvvasamāṃ
śakaiḥ suvidhinā badhvā guṃjā vaṭī
kṛtvā netra yugejanaṃ ca vidhinā tatsannipātaṃ jayet

vaidyaistyaktamacetanaṃ ca viṣamaṃ tāpaṃ hi
sarvocchitaṃ //

vanhiṃ datvā tu bhāgaikaṃ kuṣṭabhāga sa
manvitaṃ //

atha sūtavaṭī sarvvābhighāte
kalāgaṃdhakapiṣṭikā ca gaganaṃ tāpī sahoduṃbaraṃ kāṃtaṃ bhrāmaka cūrṇa sūtakasamaṃ vaikrāṃta tālānvitaṃ
pathyā tryūṣaṇa rājavṛkṣamamarī kuṣmāṃḍatoye kṛtā siddhā sūtavaṭī nihaṃti sahasā sarvvābhighātaṃ ma
hat //
kṛtvā ajājī jaraṇaṃ śivā ca śuṃḍī samāṃśaiḥrguṭikāgnikāriṇī //

athāgnidvīpanaḥ
gaṃdhāśmā gaganaṃ sutīkṣṇaharajaṃ sarvaiḥ samāṃśaiḥ kṛtaṃ mākṣīkaṃ jaraṇaṃ kaṇā kṛmi ripuḥ sauvarcalaṃ
saiṃdhavaṃ //

cavyaṃ citrakarnāgaraṃ samaricaṃ pathyānvitaṃ graṃthikaṃ dvejājīmajamodavetasa samaṃ kuṣṭaṃ tva
jīrṇāpahaṃ //

gaṃdhāśmacūrṇa na ghanaṃ sumāritaṃ rasendrarājasya śatena
cāritaṃ //

atha siṃdanāhaḥ
gaṃdhakena hataṃ brahma samasūtena cāritaṃ //

hemaṃ tu
proḍaśāṃśena cāritopi yadā rasaḥ //
suvarṇa cāritaṃ sūtaṃ aṣṭamāṃśe yadā bhavet //

hemaṃ tu ṣoḍaśāṃśena cāritopi
yadā rasaḥ //

atha dardurarasaḥ
maṃḍukāyasajaṃ cūrṇaṃ samaṃ sūtasya cāritaṃ //
kāṃtaṃ gaṃdhakasa sahitaṃ sūte jīrṇa ca tatkṛtaṃ bhasma //

śvetaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ śyāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca
karburaṃ //
jāyate capalaṃ śreṣṭaṃ ekavarṇaṃ kremeṇa vai //

sarveṣāṃ cottamaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vijñātavyaṃ pra
yatnataḥ //
abhrakaṃ hema bījaṃ tu sarva cātra prayojayet //

jvarā
dhikāre ye proktā lohajīrṇāśca ye rasāḥ //

hemasūtarasaḥ
rasaṃ hema samaṃ mardyaṃ piṣṭikārdhena gaṃdhakaṃ //

naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ
ca aṃdhamūṣāṃ nidhāpayet //

te ca saptavidhā
proktā karma teṣāmanekadhā //
teṣāṃ karma pravakṣyāmi yādṛśaṃ yasya jāyate //

śvetaṃ ca cūrṇayet sūkṣmaṃ vyā
ghrīkaṃdodare kṣipet //
svedayecca divā rātrau yāvacca tridinaṃ bhavet //

susveditaṃ tato jñātvā pra
kṣipet pāradaṃ tataḥ //
tat kṣaṇā jāyate bhasma viśuddhasphaṭikā kṛtiḥ //

tat sūte melaye bha
sma samabhāge vicakṣaṇaḥ //
ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhavedagni saho rasaḥ //

tato vyāghrīpadīkaṃde artha
yāmaṃ tu svedayet //

taccaiva palamekaṃ tu kṣipedve
ca pale budhaḥ //

bhasmatāṃ yāti tat sarvvaṃ śuddha
hemasamaprabhaṃ //

bhavedagni sahohyeṣa tataḥ siddhaṃ
raso bhavet //

bhāvito vājimūtreṇa pāradīyo mahārasaḥ
palaṃ palaśaṃte kṣipya puna hameśate kṣipet / hema sūtena koṭivedhī bhavedrasaḥ //
tataḥ svinnaṃ ca vaikrāṃtaṃ bhāgamekaṃ samāharet //

śrīḥ
śvetavarṇaṃ tu vaikrāṃtaṃ amlavetasa bhāvitaṃ //

taṃ dravaṃ śu
ddhasūtaṃ ca madhunā saha marddayet //

tāmravarṇaṃ ca vaikrāṃ
ta hiṃgulena samanvitaṃ //

tena bhasma samaṃ sūtaṃ baṃdha
māyāti nānyathā //

vaikrāṃtasya palameka hemna
syācca palaṃ tathā //
pāradasya pale dve tu khalve saṃsthāpayedbudhaḥ //

bhūdhātrī madhujīvantuau vyāghrī co
tpala sārivā //
yugalau ca yathā lābhe strīmūtre peṣayedbudhaḥ //

naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca a
dhamūṣāṃ nidhāpayet //
